notes_text: Banned in 1969. Possession of small amounts is subject to arrest and fine but no threat of jail time.
notes: Banned in 1969. Possession of small amounts is subject to arrest and fine but no threat of jail time.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Iceland}} Banned in 1969.<ref>{{cite news|title=Marihuana og LSD loks bannað hér!|url=http://timarit.is/view_page_init.jsp?pageId=3378672|access-date=10 December 2016|issue=235|publisher=Tíminn|date=25 October 1969|language=is|archive-date=21 July 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20180721073157/http://timarit.is/view_page_init.jsp?pageId=3378672|url-status=live}}</ref> Possession of small amounts is subject to arrest and fine but no threat of jail time.<ref>{{cite news |last1=Sveinn Helgason |first1=Magnús |title=Do Icelanders really smoke more cannabis than anyone else? |url=https://icelandmag.is/article/do-icelanders-really-smoke-more-cannabis-anyone-else |access-date=16 January 2019 |work=Iceland Magazine |date=26 August 2015 |archive-date=12 November 2020 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20201112034312/https://icelandmag.is/article/do-icelanders-really-smoke-more-cannabis-anyone-else |url-status=live }}</ref>
